heading: I am a tech enthusiast from Malta with a passion for software development, game design, and machine learning. I hold an M.Sc. in Machine Learning and Signal Processing and a B.Sc. in Computing Science. My diverse experience includes roles in Data Science, Front End Development, Research, and Assistant Lecturing.

I have a track record of delivering successful projects, both for academic purposes and personal initiatives. Some of my works can be found on Github. I am a creative problem-solver, known for my sense of humour, and a genuine love for technology. I possess a forward-thinking mentality and have a talent for inspiring and motivating others in a team setting.

types.name: Web Development
types.description: Creation of high-quality, responsive dashboards and productivity websites using state-of-the-art frameworks.

types.name: Software Development
types.description: Utilisation of algorithmic solutions to tackle real-world issues with proficiency in multiple programming languages.

types.name: Machine Learning
types.description: Development of artificial applications that employ advanced techniques to identify, analyse, and forecast patterns in data.

types.name: Game Development
types.description: Design and development of both first-person shooter and top-down computer and mobile games, including level design, graphics, and scripting.
